flexibleContent.content: We bring out-of-the-box Analytics to solve immediate security problems, create tailored solutions to solve specific challenges and pioneer bespoke technology to tackle novel threats.
flexibleContent.heading: Unlimited Analytics—out-of-the-box, tailored, bespoke.

flexibleContent.content: Our Analytics come in a variety of shapes and sizes, and can be tailored to any security problem—old or new.
flexibleContent.heading: Remarkably <span>flexible.<span>

usps.content: Pre-built and ready to use, our Analytics are the product of years of experience, and can be deployed at lightning speed.
usps.heading: Out-of-the-box

usps.content: When specific security problems arise, we take existing assets and tailor them to your needs—without having to start from scratch.
usps.heading: Tailored

usps.content: When entirely new security problems emerge, our team of Experts leverages Tradecraft knowledge to design and build an entirely new solution.
usps.heading: Bespoke

blocks.content: We provide a dynamic understanding of your security posture. We identify the devices connected to your network, provide continuous visibility of your users and their privileges, and track how third parties behave on your infrastructure.
blocks.heading: Discovery Analytics

blocks.content: We empower you to continuously identify unusual events or activity: abnormal cloud resource usage, cryptojacking, anomalous asset configuration changes and much more.
blocks.heading: Behavioural Analytics

blocks.content: We quantify cyber Risks and measure control effectiveness, identify which potential cyber project will provide the best reduction in Risk, measure the impact on Risk of that newly deployed tool, and much more.
blocks.heading: Risk Analytics

flexibleContent.content: In order to create an aggregated, consistent and dynamic view of security Risk, we use three incredibly rich layers of Analytics.
flexibleContent.heading: We build three layers of analytics.
Fine-tuned Data Science—the best Data Science isn't about building the most complex solution. Its about identifying patterns, understanding behaviours, and deriving insights.

usps.content: We design rules and correlations to join fields, calculate and derive values, and measure thresholds, before finally summarising our insights. Sometimes simple is best.
usps.heading: Rules and correlations

usps.content: We employ statistical and mathematical techniques—measures of central tendency, dispersion, confidence intervals—to analyse the distribution of data, observe patterns and detect outliers.
usps.heading: Mathematical models

usps.content: We engineer machine learning models to understand multidimensional characteristics of data over time. These models help us understand behaviours and patterns, so we can predict and classify future outcomes.
usps.heading: Machine learning

blocks.content: We leverage sophisticated technology to combine an almost unlimited range of data in one, central location. Rapid, scalable and highly cost effective.
blocks.heading: Our Platform

blocks.content: We provide a team of expert security data scientists, engineers and analysts to build perfectly tailored solutions—removing the need for our clients to find and train expensive, hard to find talent.
blocks.heading: Our Expertise

footerCta.content: Our team of experts thrives when tackling complex cyber challenges. If you have one, we want to hear from you.
footerCta.heading: We seek the toughest cyber problems.

guides.guide: MSF Guide to UK Managed Security
Managed Security and 3rd Party Risk Opportunity

cta.content: Learn how we’re helping global organisations take control of their cyber technology.
cta.heading: What we do

items.summary: A single, unified place for complex, disparate data.
A team of data scientists, engineers and analysts.
Learn more about the team behind Prevalent AI.
Whitepapers, blog articles, podcasts and more.
